update jk_loan_repay_plan
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repay_info_id = #{record.repayInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_loan_id = #{record.applyLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loan_limit_id = #{record.loanLimitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
delay_status = #{record.delayStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
repay_date = #{record.repayDate,jdbcType=DATE},
period_number = #{record.periodNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actual_repay_date = #{record.actualRepayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delay_days = #{record.delayDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_amount = #{record.restAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_amount = #{record.repayedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
principal = #{record.principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest = #{record.interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
commission_charge = #{record.commissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
penalty_interest_amount = #{record.penaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_principal = #{record.repayedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_interest = #{record.repayedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_commission_charge = #{record.repayedCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_penalty_interest_amount = #{record.repayedPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_principal = #{record.restPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_interest = #{record.restInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_commission_charge = #{record.restCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_penalty_interest_amount = #{record.restPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_agree_auth_apply = #{record.isAgreeAuthApply,jdbcType=TINYINT},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tenant = #{record.tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update jk_loan_repay_plan set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repay_info_id = #{record.repayInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_loan_id = #{record.applyLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loan_limit_id = #{record.loanLimitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, delay_status = #{record.delayStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, repay_date = #{record.repayDate,jdbcType=DATE}, period_number = #{record.periodNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_repay_date = #{record.actualRepayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delay_days = #{record.delayDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_amount = #{record.restAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_amount = #{record.repayedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, principal = #{record.principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest = #{record.interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, commission_charge = #{record.commissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, penalty_interest_amount = #{record.penaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_principal = #{record.repayedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_interest = #{record.repayedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_commission_charge = #{record.repayedCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_penalty_interest_amount = #{record.repayedPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_principal = #{record.restPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_interest = #{record.restInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_commission_charge = #{record.restCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_penalty_interest_amount = #{record.restPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_agree_auth_apply = #{record.isAgreeAuthApply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tenant = #{record.tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repay_info_id = #{repayInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_loan_id = #{applyLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loan_limit_id = #{loanLimitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

repay_date = #{repayDate,jdbcType=DATE},
period_number = #{periodNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actual_repay_date = #{actualRepayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delay_days = #{delayDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rest_amount = #{restAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayed_amount = #{repayedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jk_loan_repay_plan set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repay_info_id = #{repayInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_loan_id = #{applyLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loan_limit_id = #{loanLimitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, delay_status = #{delayStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, repay_date = #{repayDate,jdbcType=DATE}, period_number = #{periodNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_repay_date = #{actualRepayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delay_days = #{delayDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_amount = #{restAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_amount = #{repayedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, commission_charge = #{commissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, penalty_interest_amount = #{penaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_principal = #{repayedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_interest = #{repayedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_commission_charge = #{repayedCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayed_penalty_interest_amount = #{repayedPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_principal = #{restPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_interest = #{restInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_commission_charge = #{restCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rest_penalty_interest_amount = #{restPenaltyInterestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_agree_auth_apply = #{isAgreeAuthApply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tenant = #{tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_loan_repay_plan
order by ${orderByClause}

select if(sum(rest_amount) is null, 0,sum(rest_amount) ) as rest_amount from jk_loan_repay_plan t1, jk_loan_apply t2 where t1.apply_loan_id=t2.id and t1.uid = ${uid} and t1.status <> 2 and t1.tenant <> 'dl' and t1.repay_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) and t2.order_no is null

SELECT plan.period_number AS periodNumber,date_format(plan.repay_date, '%Y/%m/%d') AS repayDate,plan.amount AS repayAmount,plan.repayed_amount AS repayedAmount,plan.`status` FROM jk_loan_repay_plan plan WHERE plan.loan_limit_id=${loanLimitId} ORDER BY plan.period_number

select repay_date as repayDate,amount,repayed_amount as repayedAmount,showstatus from (SELECT date_format(repay_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as repay_date,sum(amount) as amount,ifnull(sum(repayed_amount),0) as repayed_amount , 4 as showstatus FROM jk_loan_repay_plan WHERE uid=${uid}
and status = 2 and 1=0
and status !=2 and delay_status=1
group by repay_date union all SELECT date_format(repay_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as repay_date,sum(amount) as amount,ifnull(sum(repayed_amount),0) as repayed_amount , case when ifnull(sum(repayed_amount),0)=0 then 0 when sum(repayed_amount) =sum(amount) then 2 else 1 end showstatus FROM jk_loan_repay_plan WHERE uid=${uid}
and status = 2
and status !=2 and delay_status=0
group by repay_date ) a order by repay_date asc

SELECT a.id,a.uid,b.loan_receipt_id as applyLoanId,a.status,date_format(a.repay_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as repayDate,a.amount as amount,ifnull(a.repayed_amount,0) as repayedAmount FROM jk_loan_repay_plan a left join jk_loan_limit b on a.loan_limit_id=b.id WHERE b.type=0 and a.uid=${uid} and a.repay_date='${date}'
and a.status = 2
and a.status !=2 and a.delay_status=0
and a.status !=2 and a.delay_status=0
and a.status !=2 and a.delay_status=1
order by a.repay_date asc

select if(sum(rest_amount) is null, 0,sum(rest_amount) ) as rest_amount from jk_loan_repay_plan t1, jk_loan_apply t2 where t1.apply_loan_id=t2.id and t1.uid = ${uid} and t1.status <> 2 and t1.tenant <> 'dl' and t2.order_no is null
